Hello Laura,
=A0
I think it is really nice that you want to recognize othe=
rs for their work. I do support that. As long as there won't be many posts =
on this site.=A0 I like to keep each of these groups separate.
=A0
I will t=
ry to go back later and check the site out.
=A0
~Blessed Be~
Clara
=A0
=A0
=
=A0
--- On Tue, 12/2/08, Laura Kimberley <itcnap@...> wrote:

From: L=
aura Kimberley <itcnap@...>
Subject: RE: [SPAM]Re: [EVP-ITC] The IPAA=
 Official Nominees Site is now OPEN!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tues=
day, December 2, 2008, 1:08 PM








Hello Clara,
=A0
I am a evp-itc rese=
archer and interested in the paranormal as you obviously are. I created a p=
rogram to simply put it=85to acknowledge hard working people who donate the=
ir lives, their blood, sweat and tears to opening doors to learning to spea=
k to the dead, ufo=92s and anything paranormal. I am also the Moderator of =
this group. I do not normally send out invites , this is my first as this i=
s the first in History that I am completely aware of to help people network=
, make friends, promote their work and ideas on this new site. And to give =
the an award for their hard earned work!! =A0I hope that you will go visit =
and watch the video and read what I have to say. If you don=92t like it=85t=
hen that=92s ok too. There are a lot of people here, that =A0I admire, that=
 are in the background and working =A0hard almost daily, I just want to sho=
w my appreciation in ALL that ALL of YOU do!
=A0
Blessings,
Laura Kimberley=

Director of IPAA
=A0


From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto:EVP- ITC@yah=
oogroups. com] On Behalf Of Clara Febach
Sent: Tuesday, December 02, 2008 1=
2:50 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Subject: [SPAM]Re: [EVP-ITC] The IPAA =
Official Nominees Site is now OPEN!
=A0








Who is IPAA and why am I re=
ceiving this information with a link for me to click on?

=A0

I would pref=
er not to receive these kinds of invitations through this group.=A0 I usual=
ly get enough ads as it is without getting them enclosed in messages from g=
roups I belong to. In the past I=A0have received invitations sent directly =
to=A0my email address=A0and read them when it is convenient for me to take =
EXTRA time to read them.

=A0

Please don't make me hesitate to open EVP-IT=
C messages.

=A0

Thank you.


--- On Tue, 12/2/08, ghuny1 <itcnap@gmail. c=
om> wrote:

From: ghuny1 <itcnap@gmail. com>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] The IPAA Of=
ficial Nominees Site is now OPEN!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Tuesda=
y, December 2, 2008, 10:27 AM



Dear Friends,

Welcome to the Official IPA=
A Nominations site. This is a new venture
and has never been done before on=
 this global level. This site, ANYONE
can join, it is FREE, you can showcas=
e your work, network with others,
create projects with new friends, and of =
course showcase your sincere
dedicated hard work, promote yourselves, and p=
romote your books,
movies, music, TV shows, radio shows, all your talent in=
 the
Paranormal! Networking and helping others in a haunting or a Mufon
wat=
ch, the ideas are endless!

We are working hard to find sponsorships and un=
fortunately this 1st
annual event, donations are required to help offset th=
e awards. Any
donations at $25.00 or more would be greatly appreciated.

Al=
l nominees, will become featured members. The donations are good
till Nov 7=
, 2009 and that's a wonderful savings and very affordable
for all to partic=
ipate and enjoy ALL YOUR hard work!

Sending You All the Best from IPAA

ht=
tp://www.ipaaward s.org

Laura Kimberley,
Director of IPAA
=A0
